Home.Title: Yudi Yamada | Full Stack Engineer
Home.Description: Professional portfolio of Yudi Yamada, Full Stack Engineer specializing in React, Next.js, and Node.js. Turning ideas into reality through code.
Home.Name: Yudi Yamada
Home.Introduction: Professional with a degree in Systems Analysis and Development, passionate about technology and innovation. I am a dedicated individual with a strong ability to solve problems and work effectively in teams. I am eager to contribute my expertise and enthusiasm to challenging projects, helping transform ideas into reality.
Home.ProfileImageAlt: Yudi Yamada - Full Stack Engineer and Web Developer

About.Title: About Yudi Yamada | Full Stack Experience & Education
About.Description: Learn more about Yudi Yamada's professional background as a Full Stack Engineer. Expert in React, Node.js, and Cloud Infrastructure.
About.HireMeDescription: I work as a Full Stack Engineer, applying my expertise in React.js, Next.js, Node.js, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL to build modern and scalable solutions. I have experience with agile methodologies, REST API integration, testing with Jest, and tools such as Docker and Git.
About.MyExperiencesDescription: Below is a summary of the experience I have acquired during my career.
About.YamadaFinanceTrackTitle: Frontend Engineer | Financial Dashboards & Data Visualization
About.YamadaFinanceTrackDescription: Developed Yamada Finance Track, a modern financial management system focused on real-time data accuracy and intuitive user experience. The application provides a comprehensive dashboard for tracking income, expenses, and overall balance with advanced filtering capabilities.
About.BewearTitle: Full Stack Engineer | Bewear (Modern E-commerce Platform)
About.BewearDescription: Developed a high-performance, full-featured e-commerce platform using the latest React/Next.js ecosystem. The project focuses on scalability, type safety, and seamless user experience, from product discovery to secure checkout.
About.MoviesLibraryTitle: Frontend Engineer | API Integration & Interactive Web Applications
About.MoviesLibraryDescription: Developed Movies Library, a dynamic Single Page Application (SPA) that consumes the TMDB API to provide a real-time cinematic database exploration experience. The project focuses on high-performance search, efficient data fetching, and scalable routing.
About.SpotifyCloneTitle: Full Stack Engineer | Media Streaming & API Architecture
About.SpotifyCloneDescription: Developed a high-fidelity Spotify Clone, a full-stack music streaming SPA designed to handle real-time audio playback, complex navigation, and high-performance data delivery.
About.ITInternshipDescription: Technical Support: Troubleshooting hardware, software, systems, and network issues.
About.MyDegreesDescription: Below, I present my course certifications and academic degrees.
About.AssociateDegree: Associate Degree in Systems Analysis and Development
About.MySkillsDescription: Below are my core skills and technologies.

Contact.WorkTogetherDescription: Did you like my work? Then get in touch so we can work together! I'm currently available for new projects and opportunities.

Projects.Title: Portfolio Projects | Yudi Yamada - Full Stack Engineer
Projects.Description: Explore my latest web development projects including Yamada Finance Track, Spotify Clone, and Bewear E-commerce. Specialized in React, Next.js, and Node.js.
Projects.YamadaFinanceTrackDescription: Developed Yamada Finance Track, a modern financial management system focused on real-time data accuracy and intuitive user experience. The application provides a comprehensive dashboard for tracking income, expenses, and overall balance with advanced filtering capabilities.
Projects.SpotifyDescription: Developed a high-fidelity Spotify Clone, a full-stack music streaming SPA designed to handle real-time audio playback, complex navigation, and high-performance data delivery.
Projects.TypicalFruitsDescription: I present my personal project about fruits from my state, in the form of little cards.
Projects.BewearDescription: Developed a high-performance, full-featured e-commerce platform using the latest React/Next.js ecosystem. The project focuses on scalability, type safety, and seamless user experience, from product discovery to secure checkout.
Projects.MoviesLibraryDescription: Developed Movies Library, a dynamic Single Page Application (SPA) that consumes the TMDB API to provide a real-time cinematic database exploration experience. The project focuses on high-performance search, efficient data fetching, and scalable routing.
Projects.BlogDescription: Blog developed with React and JSONPlaceholder to simulate blog posts.

Services.Title: Services | Full Stack Engineering & Cloud Solutions
Services.Description: Explore my professional services: Frontend & Backend Engineering, Fullstack Development, Cloud Infrastructure, and Technical Consulting. Scalable solutions for your digital product.
Services.FrontendEngineerDescription: Specialist in high-performance interfaces and scalable design systems. I develop applications focused on Core Web Vitals, ensuring the product is not only visually flawless but extremely fast, accessible, and optimized for search engines (SEO).
Services.BackendEngineerDescription: Development of robust ecosystems and resilient APIs. Focused on microservices architecture, complex data modeling (SQL/NoSQL), and implementing security layers, ensuring the system supports high loads while maintaining low latency.
Services.FullstackEngineerDescription: End-to-end engineering: from database design to user interface. I have full mastery of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC), integrating CI/CD pipelines, automated testing, and third-party service integration to deliver market-ready digital products.
Services.InfrastructureAndCloudDescription: Environment optimization and scalable deployment. Server configuration, development environment automation, and ensuring system availability through monitoring and Infrastructure as Code (IaC) best practices.
Services.HardwareConsultingDescription: High-level diagnostics and local infrastructure optimization. I work on custom machine architecture for high performance, strategic upgrades, and operating system recovery, focusing on extracting maximum performance from available hardware.
Services.ComingSoonDescription: I am currently acquiring new skills.
